queries.query:
from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_curr_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_prev_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_moisture")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_ldr_lightness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_curr_status_dur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: string(v: int(v: r._value) / 86400) + "d " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 86400) / 3600) + "h " +
              string(v: ((int(v: r._value) % 3600) / 60)) + "m " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 60)) + "s"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_prev_status_dur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
        |> map(fn: (r) => ({
          r with
          _value: string(v: int(v: r._value) / 86400) + "d " +
                  string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 86400) / 3600) + "h " +
                  string(v: ((int(v: r._value) % 3600) / 60)) + "m " +
                  string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 60)) + "s"
      }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "soil_temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outside_temp" or r["_field"] == "sensor_bme280_temperature" or r["_field"] == "sensor_sht41_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_status_pos" or r["_field"] == "sensor_soil_status_len")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: string(v: int(v: r.sensor_soil_status_pos)) + "/" + string(v: int(v: r.sensor_soil_status_len))
      }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "c_sys_uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: string(v: int(v: r._value) / 86400) + "d " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 86400) / 3600) + "h " +
              string(v: ((int(v: r._value) % 3600) / 60)) + "m " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 60)) + "s"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "c_sys_lifetime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: string(v: int(v: r._value) / 86400) + "d " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 86400) / 3600) + "h " +
              string(v: ((int(v: r._value) % 3600) / 60)) + "m " +
              string(v: (int(v: r._value) % 60)) + "s"
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "device_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sensor_bme280_humidity" or r["_field"] == "sensor_sht41_humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "369C92005E9930A1D2BE64BD97049EC0C8A9FD36")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
